thread.section_title: Unlockradar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Unlockradar | unlockradar.com
thread.title: Linda Schmidt

author: Linda Schmidt
title: Linda Schmidt
text: I am so happy about the customer service that I received I messaged the company on Facebook to see if my phone would be eligible to unlock. They responded in a timely manner, and told me my phone would be eligible. I decided to go ahead and purchase and go through with the transaction and I am not displeased they told me it would take anywhere between 24 hours and 3 days and it didn't even take an hour. I will recommend this company to all of my friends and family.
